Grey Wolf Optimizer

Module to run the Grey Wolf Optimizer (GWO) algorithm. This code is based on the following scientific article: https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1757-899X/83/1/012014/pdf

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.buildClusterRoute()

Method to build route from the cluster

Parameters

  • cluster_customer (List[Customer]) – Customer in the cluster

  • depot (DepotCvrp) – Depot of the cvrp instance

Returns

List of NodeWithCoord ordered representing the route

Return type

List[NodeWithCoord]

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.costInsertion()

Method to compute the insertion cost of a customer

Parameters

  • customer (CustomerCvrp) – Customer to insert in the route

  • route (List[NodeWithCoord]) – Route to insert customer

  • place (int) – Place to estimate the insertion of the customer

Returns

The cost of the insertion at the given place

Return type

float

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.euclideanDistance()

Function to compute the euclidean distance between 2 customers

Parameters

  • customer1 (CustomerCvrp) – First customer

  • customer2 (CustomerCvrp) – Second customer

Returns

The distance between the 2 customers

Return type

float

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.euclideanDistanceCluster()

Compute the euclidean distance between a cutomer and the clusters

Parameters

  • customer (CustomerCvrp) – Customer

  • cluster_centers (List[Tuple[float, float]]) – List of clusters center

Returns

LIst of distance between customer and clusters center

Return type

List[float]

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.euclideanDistancePoint()
Parameters

  • customer (CustomerCvrp) – Customer to compute the distance

  • point (Tuple[int]) – Point to compute the distance

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.findBestPlace()

Method to find the best place to insert a customer in the route

Parameters

  • customer (CustomerCvrp) – Customer to insert in the route

  • route (List[NodeWithCoord]) – Route to insert customer

Returns

The best place to insert the customer

Return type

int

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.greyWolfSolver()

Function to launch the Grey Wolf Optimizer

Parameters

  • cvrp (Cvrp) – The cvrp instance to find a solution

  • iteration (int) – Number of iteration to run

  • wolf_number (int) – Number of wolf

  • max_second_run (int) – Maximum second to run tabu search

Returns

Solution found and the evaluation

Return type

Tuple[List[SolutionCvrp], List[float]]

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.kMeanCapacited()

Function to run the capacited kmean algorithm

Parameters

  • cvrp (Cvrp) – Cvrp instance

  • cluster_center (List[Tuple[float, float]]) – List of cluster center, default to None (opt.)

  • update_centers (bool) – Boolean to know if the centers should be updated or not

Returns

The cluster center and the customer assign to clusters

Return type

Tuple[List[Tuple[float, float]], List[List[CustomerCvrp]]]

solution.metaheuristic.gwo.updateClusterCenter()

Method to update the cluster center

Parameters

point_assignment (List[CustomerCvrp]) – Cluster of customer assignment

Returns

The update cluster center

Return type

Tuple[float, float]
